verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w another|strong="G0032"\w* \w angel|strong="G2597"\w* come \w down|strong="G1537"\w* \w from|strong="G3588"\w* \w heaven|strong="G2192"\w*, \w having|strong="G1849"\w* \w great|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G3173"\w*; \w and|strong="G3588"\w* the \w earth|strong="G5461"\w* was \w lightened|strong="G1537"\w* \w with|strong="G3588"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* \w mightily|strong="G2479"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w strong|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w* the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* is \w fallen|strong="G4098"\w*, is \w fallen|strong="G4098"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* is \w become|strong="G1096"\w* the \w habitation|strong="G2732"\w* of \w devils|strong="G1142"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w hold|strong="G5438"\w* of \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w foul|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w cage|strong="G5438"\w* of \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hateful|strong="G3404"\w* \w bird|strong="G3732"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* have \w drunk|strong="G4095"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* of the \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* have committed \w fornication|strong="G4203"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w merchants|strong="G1713"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* are waxed \w rich|strong="G4147"\w* \w through|strong="G1537"\w* the \w abundance|strong="G1411"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w delicacies|strong="G4764"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Come|strong="G1831"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w be|strong="G4790"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w partakers|strong="G4790"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* have \w reached|strong="G0190"\w* \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w remembered|strong="G3421"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w iniquities|strong="G0092"\w*.

\w Reward|strong="G0591"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w she|strong="G0846"\w* \w rewarded|strong="G0591"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w double|strong="G1363"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w double|strong="G1362"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*: \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w cup|strong="G4221"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* she hath \w filled|strong="G2767"\w* \w fill|strong="G2767"\w* to \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w double|strong="G1362"\w*.

How \w much|strong="G3745"\w* she hath \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w herself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* lived \w deliciously|strong="G4763"\w*, so \w much|strong="G5118"\w* \w torment|strong="G0929"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sorrow|strong="G3997"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* she \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, I \w sit|strong="G2521"\w* a \w queen|strong="G0938"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w widow|strong="G5503"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w sorrow|strong="G3997"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w shall|strong="G2240"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w* \w come|strong="G2240"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mourning|strong="G3997"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w famine|strong="G3042"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* she shall be utterly \w burned|strong="G2618"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w strong|strong="G2478"\w* \add is\add* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* who \w judgeth|strong="G2919"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* have committed \w fornication|strong="G4203"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* lived \w deliciously|strong="G4763"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, shall \w bewail|strong="G2799"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lament|strong="G2875"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* they shall \w see|strong="G0991"\w* the \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w burning|strong="G4451"\w*,

\w Standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w afar|strong="G3113"\w* \w off|strong="G0575"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w torment|strong="G0929"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Alas|strong="G3759"\w*, \w alas|strong="G3759"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w*, that \w mighty|strong="G2478"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*! \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* is \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w merchants|strong="G1713"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* shall \w weep|strong="G2799"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mourn|strong="G3996"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w buyeth|strong="G0059"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w merchandise|strong="G1117"\w* any \w more|strong="G3765"\w*:

The \w merchandise|strong="G1117"\w* of \w gold|strong="G5557"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w silver|strong="G0696"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w pearls|strong="G3135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* fine \w linen|strong="G1040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w purple|strong="G4209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w silk|strong="G4596"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scarlet|strong="G2847"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w thyine|strong="G2367"\w* \w wood|strong="G3586"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* all \w manner|strong="G3956"\w* \w vessels|strong="G4632"\w* of \w ivory|strong="G1661"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* all \w manner|strong="G3956"\w* \w vessels|strong="G4632"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* most \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w wood|strong="G3586"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w brass|strong="G5475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w iron|strong="G4604"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w marble|strong="G3139"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w cinnamon|strong="G2792"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w odours|strong="G2368"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ointments|strong="G3464"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w frankincense|strong="G3030"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w oil|strong="G1637"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* fine \w flour|strong="G4585"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wheat|strong="G4621"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2934"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w horses|strong="G2462"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w chariots|strong="G4480"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w slaves|strong="G4983"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fruits|strong="G3703"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* lusted \w after|strong="G1939"\w* are \w departed|strong="G0565"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* which were \w dainty|strong="G3045"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w goodly|strong="G2986"\w* are \w departed|strong="G0565"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thou shalt \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w* at \w all|strong="G3361"\w*.

The \w merchants|strong="G1713"\w* of these \w things|strong="G5130"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were made \w rich|strong="G4147"\w* \w by|strong="G0575"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, shall \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w afar|strong="G3113"\w* \w off|strong="G0575"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w torment|strong="G0929"\w*, \w weeping|strong="G2799"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wailing|strong="G3996"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Alas|strong="G3759"\w*, \w alas|strong="G3759"\w*, that \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, that was \w clothed|strong="G4016"\w* in fine \w linen|strong="G1039"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w purple|strong="G4210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scarlet|strong="G2847"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w decked|strong="G5558"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w gold|strong="G5557"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pearls|strong="G3135"\w*!

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* in \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* so \w great|strong="G5118"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* is come to \w nought|strong="G2049"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w shipmaster|strong="G2942"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w company|strong="G3658"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w ships|strong="G4143"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sailors|strong="G3492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* trade \w by|strong="G2038"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w afar|strong="G3113"\w* \w off|strong="G0575"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* when they \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* the \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w burning|strong="G4451"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \add city is\add* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* this \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*!

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w dust|strong="G5522"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, \w weeping|strong="G2799"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wailing|strong="G3996"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Alas|strong="G3759"\w*, \w alas|strong="G3759"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G1722"\w* were made \w rich|strong="G4147"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w ships|strong="G4143"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* by reason \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w costliness|strong="G5094"\w*! \w for|strong="G3754"\w* in \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* is she made \w desolate|strong="G2049"\w*.

\w Rejoice|strong="G2165"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \add thou\add* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add ye\add* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w hath|strong="G2919"\w* \w avenged|strong="G2917"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1520"\w* \w mighty|strong="G2478"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* took \w up|strong="G0142"\w* a \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w millstone|strong="G3458"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \add it\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Thus|strong="G3779"\w* with \w violence|strong="G3731"\w* \w shall|strong="G0906"\w* that \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w* be thrown \w down|strong="G0906"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall be \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* at \w all|strong="G3361"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of \w harpers|strong="G2790"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w musicians|strong="G3451"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w pipers|strong="G0834"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w trumpeters|strong="G4538"\w*, shall be \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* at \w all|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3956"\w* \w craftsman|strong="G5079"\w*, of \w whatsoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w craft|strong="G5078"\w* \add he be\add*, shall be \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w any|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sound|strong="G5456"\w* of a \w millstone|strong="G3458"\w* shall be \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* at \w all|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w light|strong="G5457"\w* of a \w candle|strong="G3088"\w* shall \w shine|strong="G5316"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* at \w all|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of the \w bridegroom|strong="G3566"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w bride|strong="G3565"\w* shall be \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* at \w all|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w merchants|strong="G1713"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* the great \w men|strong="G3175"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w sorceries|strong="G5331"\w* \w were|strong="G4105"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* \w deceived|strong="G4105"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* was \w found|strong="G2147"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that were \w slain|strong="G4969"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.
